description:
High strength, low stretch webbing for long lines and highlines. This 1in. flat webbing has distinct markings along the length of it so you can easily set it up and estimate the distance.

  • Flat polyester webbing has a minimum breaking strength of 3500kg
  • Colour-coded edges let you easily see twists over the length of the line
  • Logos every 3 meters for quick length estimates
  • Sold by the meter
name: Slackline Industries Sugoi 1" (25mm) Slackline Webbing
